Automatic message templating for Twitter

Write template messages on Twitter using various variables that will be grabbed directly from their profiles.

No more copy and paste when writing messages on Twitter. The persons name will be automatically added to your message template.

No cost, completely free. No signup required

Fields available: FirstName, LastName, FullName, UserName, Website, Birthday, Location, City, Country.
